articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Apple Vision Pro headset is Apple's next Mac and TV combined - HT Tech
articles.description: Apple's Vision Pro headset, priced at $3,500, has entered the market, potentially disrupting both traditional television and computer usage.
articles.content: Apple's Vision Pro could upend how people watch television at home and how they use computers at work, potentially positioning the headset to be a successor to both traditional television and the Mac… [+4732 chars]
